title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: Try clicking on the first Combo.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, it does not take focus anymore. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
EB: The first Combo should take focus when clicked on, regardless of whether the combo list is dropped down or not.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog.
2. Press the 'Tab' key and observe that the focus goes to the second Combo 'Repository Path:'.
